Menu.description: Saad® is an internationally award-winning boutique consultancy in business & brand innovation building organizations that disrupt markets, fuel genuine growth, and set new benchmarks — crafted for the future, never for the ordinary.

Marquee.message: Let's create the future of your business.

first.title: Clear-Cut Strategy
first.text: We dive deep into your business to craft razor-sharp, adaptable strategies. Through rigorous diagnosis and immersion, we map every facet — from market forces to cultural nuances — to create a living blueprint for authentic transformation and lasting advantage.

second.title: Clever Design
second.text: We turn your brand’s singularity into timeless design and a sophisticated narrative. Every visual and verbal element breaks from the generic to spark resonance, forge enduring experiences, and build distinctive value across all touchpoints. You'll cut through the noise, not just echo.

third.title: Tailor-made
third.text: As a true boutique, we obsess over every detail, co-creating a universe bespoke to your context through a seamless approach. From initial insight to full rollout, we deliver competitive differentiation and measurable results — business value that lasts, not dusty drawer projects.

Cookies.message: We’re all about crafting experiences, even here. Our cookies are designed to enhance your journey, offering insights that help us shape a more tailored, thoughtful interaction.

Home.pageDescription: Saad® is an internationally award-winning boutique consultancy in business & brand innovation building organizations that disrupt markets, fuel genuine growth, and set new benchmarks — crafted for the future, never for the ordinary.

About.pageDescription: What we do goes beyond any label. We don't just imagine new futures — we design, build and deliver them, side by side with our clients.

TopSection.title: What we do goes beyond any label. We don't just imagine new futures — we design, build and deliver them, side by side with our clients.
TopSection.text_01: We are a boutique transformation consultancy that fuses strategy, business model innovation, branding, design, experience, and end-to-end implementation to create adaptive and resilient organizations.
TopSection.text_02: Every project is uniquely crafted — from in-depth diagnosis through execution and continuous evolution — measured by concrete results, not mere intentions.
TopSection.text_03: This isn’t off-the-shelf consulting, nor is it surface-level change. It’s about driving authentic transformation powered by rigorous methodology, creative originality, and relentless execution.

About.text_01: Lucas Saad, founder and director of Saad, holds a degree in Design and a postgraduate specialization in Branding, with an extension of his MBA at Brunel University in London. He also participated in the Global Creative Leadership program at THNK — The Amsterdam School of Creative Leadership and completed the Management for Organizations of the Future (TEAL) executive program at CESAR School.
About.text_02: With over 20 years of experience in Brazil and abroad, he has led projects for companies of all sizes — from emerging brands to multinationals such as Dow AgroSciences and Brookfield Renewable Energy — across sectors including technology, consumer goods, healthcare, energy, agribusiness, mobility, engineering, services, media and entertainment, among others.

PrivacyPolicy.pageDescription: Our goal is to ensure transparency and provide you with control over your personal data.

TopSection.title: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information.
TopSection.text: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and disclose your data, and the choices you have regarding your information. Our goal is to ensure transparency and provide you with control over your personal data. By using our website or services, you agree to the practices described in this policy.
